title: New diterpene lactone derivatives from Aphanamixis polystachya leaves inhibit nitric oxide production in RAW 264.7 cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20536-20542
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02968B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ngo Anh Bang, Duong Thi Hai Yen, Dan Thi Thuy Hang, Pham Hai Yen, Nguyen Huy Hoang, Do Thi Trang, Duong Thi Dung, Nguyen Thi Cuc, Nguyen The Cuong, Nguyen Xuan Nhiem, Bui Huu Tai, Phan Van Kiem
Five new acyclic diterpene lactone derivatives containing two rare structural fragments a γ/δ-lactone and a furan-3-one from Aphanamixis polystachya. They inhibited NO production in LPS activated RAW264.7 cells with IC50 values of 16.8–37.7 μM.
